mapper.insert: insert into team (num, name, late_start, late_interval, late_fee, late_max, late_maxFee, absent_fee, fee, board, admin, date, member, reg_date, week, city, goal, category, hashTag, secret) values (#{num}, #{name}, #{late_start}, #{late_interval}, #{late_fee}, #{late_max}, #{late_maxFee}, #{absent_fee}, #{fee}, #{board}, #{admin}, now(), #{member}, now(), #{week}, #{city}, #{goal}, #{category}, #{hashTag}, #{secret})
mapper.select: select * from team order by num
mapper.insert: insert into attendence (num, group_num, attend_time, date, late_interval, late_fee, fee, id, absent_fee, status) values (#{num}, #{group_num}, now(), now(), #{late_interval}, #{late_fee}, #{fee}, #{id}, #{absent_fee}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from attendence order by date desc
select * from attendence where id = #{id} and date = #{date}
select * from attendence where id = #{id} and date = #{date} and group_num = #{group_num}
select * from attendence where id = #{id} and group_num = #{group_num}
mapper.update: update team set member = #{member} where num=#{group_num}
mapper.select:
select * from team where (secret = 0)
and
week like concat('%',#{week},'%')
and (city = #{city})
and (goal = #{goal})
and (category like concat('%',#{category},'%'))
and (hashTag like concat('%',#{search_input},'%') or name like concat('%',#{search_input},'%'))
